public void crossCheckPoint()
Player crosses a check point. This one is flagged as reached and next one is activated.

crossLine

public void crossLine()
Player crosses finish line, add to laps. Only counts if : - all the checkpoints of the track were crossed After crossing the line, resets checkpoints.
